text: Lindsey Erin Pearlman (October 5, 1978 â€“ February 18, 2022) was an American actress. She was known for her roles on General Hospital and Chicago Justice. She also appeared in The Ms. Pat Show and Selena: The Series on Netflix. Pearlman was born in Chicago, Illinois. On February 13, 2022 she went missing in Los Angeles. Five days later, she was found dead in a car near Runyon Canyon Park in Hollywood, California at aged 43. In August 2022, the cause of death was suicide by overdose of sodium nitrite. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Drug-related suicides in the United States Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Lindsey Pearlman
